snippet.title: Mini Motorways Trailer - Out NOW on Apple Arcade & Steam!
snippet.description:
It’s finally here! We’re so excited to share Mini Motorways with our Steam audience and to introduce our Apple Arcade players to brand new maps and features via the Round Trip update.

Draw the roads that drive the city.
From the creators of acclaimed minimalist subway simulator Mini Metro, Mini Motorways is a game about drawing the roads that drive a growing city. Build a road network, one road at a time, to create a bustling metropolis. Redesign your city to keep the traffic flowing, and carefully manage upgrades such as roundabouts, motorways, and traffic lights to meet the changing demands. Unlock eleven maps, hunt down many new achievements, and go head to head with other players in our daily and weekly challenges. 

🕹️  https://apple.co/~minimotorways
🕹️  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1127500/Mini_Motorways/

How long can you keep the cities of the world moving?
